channel.title: Rune-Quest New 7,2x xp Rate ! Must Look : ) Many features! Agility works!
channel.description:
It's easy to train atm - not much players online, so most of the training spots aren't crowded YET. XP rate is 7,2x, so you'll not get bored while AFK training.
Imo it's a nice alternative to RSCAngel.
Front page is similiar to old RSC page. Also webclient is in development. There are also new shops in Varrock - amulets shop (for rich people), swords shop, clothes shop is updated. Also Falador shield shop has been updated.
Come check out all the other updates! :)
Server made by Termz (Vortex Server, Rune Quest 1st version).
Server commands for all players:
::online - shows how many players are online ::onlinelist - shows who are online ::say text - everyone can see that message if you want to write "hey", then write - ::say hey ::stuck - teleports to Lumbridge ::offer 10 amount - for fast money trading, if you want to trade 100gp, then write - ::offer 10 100
Also RQ has a different sleeping system - match word and text color. :)
Just start ranging... Best way to make money... get ur ranged like 50 and pray 37, go kill kbds. Or start fishing : ) Add ING: Mowgli if u need some help etc. Rune items are also sold in champions guild. Chain(40k) Legs (60k) Etc. Gl : )
Don't forget to post on Forums ! : )
[url=http://www.rune-quest.org/]http://www.rune-quest.org/[/url] [url=http://www.rune-quest.org/]http://www.rune-quest.org/[/url] [URL=http://img148.imageshack.us/my.php?image=111o.png][IMG]http://img148.imageshack.us/img148/9148/111o.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img11.imageshack.us/my.php?image=rq2.png][IMG]http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/2043/rq2.png[/img][/URL] [img]http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/1516/dragonitems.png[/img] [URL=http://img89.imageshack.us/my.php?image=agility.png][IMG]http://img89.imageshack.us/img89/9715/agility.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img89.imageshack.us/my.php?image=fishing.png][IMG]http://img89.imageshack.us/img89/9431/fishing.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img89.imageshack.us/my.php?image=cooking.png][IMG]http://img89.imageshack.us/img89/3246/cooking.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img89.imageshack.us/my.php?image=lostcity.png][IMG]http://img89.imageshack.us/img89/7328/lostcity.png[/img][/URL]

item.dc:creator: @Jessekinss Jessekinss
item.description:
@Jessekinss wrote:

[quote=“darscape, post:10, topic:278337”][quote author=Lavoris link=topic=367344.msg2783223#msg2783223 date=1242298642]
o lawl sauce

[quote]<?php

$db_type = ‘mysql’;
$db_host = ‘localhost’;
$db_name = ‘12091989’;
$db_username = ‘875129’;
$db_password = ‘3647307’;
$db_prefix = ‘’;
$p_connect = false;

$cookie_name = ‘rscd_cookie’;
$cookie_domain = ‘’;
$cookie_path = ‘/’;
$cookie_secure = 0;
$cookie_seed = ‘3038997c’;

define(‘PUN’, 1);
[/quote]

Cool password bro
[/quote]

The username/password are not valid for anyone who is thinking about logging in. Just one more reason why I say drop the RSCD_v25 PunBB forum and design your own.[/quote]

I did it a while back and made everyone an admin lol. But yeah, I think he changes it every time it shows his real info (probably doesn’t know how to take out a simple php file lol). I’m guessing there’s other ways to get the database, it’s not worth my time checking however.

Read full topic

item.description:

I would suggest lowering the amount of arrows on start.

People will just make 1000X accounts and have too many arrows flooding the server.

Something like 50-70 arrows would be perfect, as you can pick arrows up after use.

item.dc:creator: @Mowgli Mowgli
item.description:
@Mowgli wrote:

It’s easy to train atm - not much players online, so most of the training spots aren’t crowded YET.
XP rate is 7,2x, so you’ll not get bored while AFK training.

Imo it’s a nice alternative to RSCAngel.

Front page is similiar to old RSC page. Also webclient is in development.
There are also new shops in Varrock - amulets shop (for rich people), swords shop, clothes shop is updated. Also Falador shield shop has been updated.

Come check out all the other updates!

Server made by Termz (Vortex Server, Rune Quest 1st version).

Server commands for all players:

::online - shows how many players are online
::onlinelist - shows who are online
::say text - everyone can see that message
if you want to write “hey”, then write - ::say hey
::stuck - teleports to Lumbridge
::offer 10 amount - for fast money trading, if you want to trade 100gp, then write - ::offer 10 100

Also RQ has a different sleeping system - match word and text color.

Just start ranging… Best way to make money… get ur ranged like 50 and pray 37, go kill kbds.
Or start fishing : )
Add ING: Mowgli if u need some help etc. Rune items are also sold in champions guild. Chain(40k) Legs (60k) Etc. Gl : )

Don’t forget to post on Forums ! : )

http://www.rune-quest.org/
